div.p: This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/artifact-version-policy-codes defines the following codes:

tr.td: A versioning policy that allows non-substantive changes to the metadata elements of an artifact without requiring a change to the value of the version element.

A versioning policy that indicates that any change to the content of an artifact, including non-substantive and metadata changes, requires a change to the value of the version element of the artifact.

description.value: The versioning policy of an artifact (metadata, strict)

copyright.value: This material derives from the HL7 Terminology (THO). THO is copyright Â©1989+ Health Level Seven International and is made available under the CC0 designation. For more licensing information see: https://terminology.hl7.org/license

definition.value: A versioning policy that allows non-substantive changes to the metadata elements of an artifact without requiring a change to the value of the version element.

A versioning policy that indicates that any change to the content of an artifact, including non-substantive and metadata changes, requires a change to the value of the version element of the artifact.
